title: (x) Chapter titles from Augusten Burroughs book "Magical Thinking" - Handle Old Style {Mike Y}
content:
These chapter titles caught my attention, but I can't seem to find the font. Anyone recognize this? The serifs on the T are especially unique.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141113055041im_/http:/typophile.com/files/type-ID_4479.jpg)

This is from Augusten Burroughs book "Magical Thinking," designed by Phil Mazzone.
author: • augusten burroughs

comments.content:
Your image is quite slow to load, but that Q is Handle Oldstyle, I believe.

- Mike Yanega

Here's the link to [Handle Old Style](http://web.archive.org/web/20141113055041/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/handle-old-style/).

- Mike Yanega

As seen in the movie poster for A Serious Man.

[http://fontfeed.com/archives/screenfonts-october-2009/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141113055041/http:/fontfeed.com/archives/screenfonts-october-2009/)
Thanks, Mike. I'm wholly impressed you replied in under five minutes!
